summary: The Indian Health Service provides care to American Indians and Alaska Natives through a system of health care facilities. We looked at health care coverage at IHS facilities from 2013 to 2018. Federal facility data showed that the proportion of patients with insurance grew from 64% to 78% from fiscal years 2013 through 2018. Facilities in states that expanded access to Medicaid saw the largest...
title: Indian Health Service: Facilities Reported Expanding Services Following Increases in Health Insurance Coverage and Collections
